sentences.en: Bine: Olive is had apparent force, bough and ramose.
sentences.cn: 茎: 油橄榄具有明显的主干.主枝和分枝.

sentences.en: Do not cut the Bough you are standing on.
sentences.cn: 不要砍你所立足的树枝(不要自己害自己).

sentences.en: Every bough was swinging in the wind.
sentences.cn: 每条树枝都在风里摇摆.

sentences.en: He bough a book on basketball tactics from the Xinghua book - store yesterday.
sentences.cn: 明天他在新华书店买了一本《篮球战术》.

sentences.en: He hitched a rope round a bough of a tree.
sentences.cn: 他把一根绳子绕系在一棵树枝上.

sentences.en: I hitched the rope round a bough of the tree.
I rested my fishing rod against a pine bough.
sentences.cn: 我把钓鱼竿靠在一棵松树的大树枝上。

sentences.en: In 1999, when Ford bough Volvo, Sweden was shaken.
sentences.cn: 1999年福特买下沃尔沃时, 瑞典震惊了.

sentences.en: Not any more, mocked the crows from shady pine bough perches.
sentences.cn: 时光不再啊, 乌鸦栖息在成荫的松树主枝上,向我发出嘲笑.

sentences.en: Petals on a wet, black bough.
sentences.cn: 湿漉漉的黑树枝上花瓣数点.

sentences.en: Prof. Bough formally informed the students of the date.
sentences.cn: 包教授正式通知学生日期.

sentences.en: The bird settled on the topmost bough.
sentences.cn: 这只鸟儿在最高的权枝上停了下来.

sentences.en: The bough that bear most hang lowest.
The bough that bears most, hangs lowest.
sentences.cn: 枝头结果越多, 垂得越低.

sentences.en: We saw a finch light on ( or upon ) a bough.
sentences.cn: 我们看到树枝上停著或一只麻雀.

trans.tran_en: a main branch on a tree
